item.title: Read system environment variables with python-part 2
item.description: # Overview Create a python program that acquires system environment variables by applying Reading system environment variables with python-Part 1. Constitution EnvironWrapper.py—A python class that encapsulates system environment variables import os class EnvironWrapper: """ class:EnvironWrapper Overview: A class that holds startup parameters read from environment variables """ # Environment variable defaultenv_context = { "SECRET_KEY" :'naishokey', # SECRET_KEY "DEBUG_FLG" :'true', # DEBUG_FLG "ALLOWED_HOSTS": None, # ALLOWED_HOSTS } # Environment variable getenv_context = {} def __init__(self): """ constructor read environment variables from os.
